attributes.action: Prevent the London Mayor from using his office to make political statements
attributes.additional_details: Prevent the London Mayor from using his office to make political statements such as granting permission to allow anti President Trump inflatables being flown over London. It is not the remit of a Mayor to act in a way that is detrimental to our nation.
attributes.background: Such acts are damaging to our country and Khan has no right to `speak` on behalf of the people of this country. Such behaviour incites unrest and the possibility of disorder.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The Mayor of London is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
